ccre.log

Class BootLogger

  • java.lang.Object
    • ccre.log.BootLogger
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LoggingTarget

    public class BootLogger
extends java.lang.Object
implements LoggingTarget
    A logging tool that holds the first twenty log messages so that they can be viewed over the network.
    Author:
    skeggsc

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      BootLogger()
      Create a new BootLogger that publishes it over the CluckGlobal node.
      BootLogger(CluckNode node)
      Create a new BootLogger that publishes it over the specified node.
